Excellence.assessmentDescription: With this life approach, I aspire to be the best possible version of myself. I know that my work is a representation of who I am, and I hold everything I do and everyone I interact with to the highest standards. I am a lifelong learner who strives for mastery of my craft.
Excellence.assessmentExpectation: Task: Write a list of obstacles that you face in your current daily life. Resources: Transform them one at a time into a set of opportunities, and outine the process to get there. Include: Share with your colleagues for reflection. Task: Describe how you currently embody excellence, and how you strive to to do so in the future. Resources: Create a short blog post, reflection, image, or other artifact. Incude: Share with your colleagues for reflection.

scoringContext.description: The output was not submiited
Ignore the problem and/or does not seek help.
Seeks help
Seeks to solve it in a way that adds value to him/herself and others.

Passion.assessmentDescription: With this life approach, I believe I can change the world and I act accordingly. I constantly seek to inspire and to be inspired. I approach every goal with unwavering energy and conviction; I embody grit and persistence.
Passion.assessmentContext: When disagreeing or challenging a teammate...
Passion.assessmentExpectation: Task: Craft your own personal (and/or professional) mission and vision statements. Resources: Create a short statement in writing. Task: Draw an Inspiration Map that shows where you derive your inspiration from and what your core passions are. Resources: Use any physical or digital medium you choose. Task: Create a vision board that shows your passions and how you plan to act on them.Resources: Use any physical or digital medium you choose.

scoringContext.description: The output was not submiited
Fails to give feedback and/or is unable to resolve conflict (does not seek assistance)
Reaches out for assistance in solving conflict from others.
Delivers and receives (or asks for) ASK feedback, recognizes mutual contributions to each other, and walks away as friends.

Integrity.assessmentDescription: With this life approach, I live in accordance with my values. I know that all I do is a reflection of the values I profess. I embrace the added responsibility of leading by example, and want others to hold me accountable. I know Integrity is everything I say and everything I do which is a true reflections of what I value and what is important to me.
Integrity.assessmentContext: When stuck or don't understand something...
Integrity.assessmentExpectation: Task: Write a personal honor code. Resources: Reflect (in writing) on how you prioritize what is right relative to what might bring you personal benefit.Include: Share with colleageus for reflection.

scoringContext.description: The output was not submiited
Does not acknowledge any areas of weakness/doesn't seek help in areas he/she struggling in
Shy to accept or voice area of struggle, but shows potential to improve.
Is open about the blockers and challenges facing, and asks for help from support system.

Collaboration.assessmentDescription: With this life approach, I will be able to have a greater impact by joining forces with others. I will know how to effectively collaborate with individuals from different backgrounds, with different beliefs and personalities, in order to achieve our goals.
Collaboration.assessmentExpectation: Task: Co-design a guide to your team principles regarding collaboration. Resources: Use a visualization or writing. Include reflections on the creation process. Include: Collaborate with colleague on your team during the building process.

scoringContext.description: The output was not submiited
Fails to share information with other people that would enable them to do their job more effectively and/or makes minimal contribution to achievement of team goals and objectives
Willingly learns from other team members, but does not go out of the way to assist others or seek engagements
Shares work frequently, gives and asks for feedback from teammates, learns about the individual motivations of each team member

Commitment.assessmentDescription: With this life approach, I will be able to have a greater impact by joining forces with others. I will know how to effectively collaborate with individuals from different backgrounds, with different beliefs and personalities, in order to achieve our goals.

scoringContext.description: The output was not submiited
Contributes to the group but does not give strong support to the group or try to make it better; is not prepared, informed, or ready to work with the team (prefers to work individually)
Puts the team before own self interests during (could include doing some project tasks separately, but makes sure to put them together at the end)
Portrays leadership attributes by taking charge of the group, always putting group's interest before his/her own, while recognizing and using special talents of each team member
